description.value:
Also called Aetherscopes. Requires Tech-Use Skill to use. Awareness Tests made with these devices allow user to determine presence and strength of psychic forces, Dameons, lingering warp effects, etc. They have a detection range a few hundred metres, very powerful spikes can register from longer distances. Can be clouded by powerful energy fields or high psychic background noise.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 1000 T
